column4: Ok im almost done with a CHroot to reinstall grub. Im stuck on unmounting things. It says that /dev and /mnt "Device is busy."
because after umount commands is sudo reboot.
Or is it imperitive that i unmount EVERYTHING first?
Someone plz help me, it shouldnt take but a second to answer.
Im so close to fixing it... i just dont know about this issue.
All i need is a yes or no answer and im done and can go on with my business.
Repeat reall quertion? lsof to see open files, maybe this why it is busy.
You can umount them one by one, and find right order.
If you unmount you will be 100% sure that things are sasy. But reboot _propably_ will "fix" it anyway.
